Class InterruptibleInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          updater.util.InterruptibleInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, Interruptible, Pausable
public class InterruptibleInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
implements Pausable, Interruptible

Interruptible input stream.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing
